Title: Perfection
Description:
Perfection can be achieved through repetition. Every single student in the training arena below will eventually perfect his or her form... assuming they don't give up first. This is a fact.

I encourage you to join them, $n. As an honorary guest of the monastery, you are not required to perform the requisite 10,000 daily strikes. Simply follow the leader's example for a few minutes.
ObjectivesText: Perform 12 practice strikes in the Monastery Training Arena by following the leader's example.
RewardText: This isn't your first time fighting, is it? Your form isn't perfect, but it is certainly practiced.
